content: X-DR S ALH Drop rod with nail Smooth drop rod with pre-mounted nail for use with powder-actuated tools on tough concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving solution – pre-assembled ¼” smooth rod with pre-mounted DX ALH nail, delivered ready to install using powder-actuated tools Drop rod is considered a rigid system – no extra attachment to the ceiling grid needed (as per NEC 300.11) Maximized stick rate – high-performance pre-mounted ALH nail for tough concrete Safer and higher-productivity method for overhead applications – powder-actuated tools with a compatible pole tool to remove the need for lifts and ladders Virtually dust-free solution – no drilling required Applications Fastening overhead electrical hanging systems Works with all Hilti cable and conduit hanging elements (data hooks, batwings and MC stackers) For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Suspended systems Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Suspended systems | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (very tough), Concrete (tough), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck) | Approvals (global) | UL, ICC ES | Type of rod | smooth | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2230620 - Drop rod X-DR 1 S ALH27 - Package Size 50 pc - 2230621 - Drop rod X-DR 2 S ALH27 - Package Size 25 pc - 2230622 - Drop rod X-DR 3 S ALH27 - Package Size 25 pc - 2230623 - Drop rod X-DR 4 S ALH27 - Package Size 25 pc - 2230624 - Drop rod X-DR 6 S ALH27 - Package Size 25 pc
